name: All Over Europe Quiz | Geography - Wordplay | 10 Questions

questions.text: Although slow to anger, many sloths cry easily.
questions.explanation:
Germany.

	Although slow to anGER, MANY sloths cry easily. Germany is a popular tourist destination as well as a popular migration destination for those looking to relocate. Germany is known for its high level of artistic excellence in music, painting, and architecture.

Denmark.

Tourism and gambling form the backbone of this country's economy. Monaco has also been listed as having one of the highest life expectancies on the planet.

Spain is a Catholic nation with excellent lines of communication between itself and other European countries and with North America. It has one of the strongest tourism industries in the world.

Agriculture, mining and tourism provide the backbone of this nation's economy. In 2001, Portugal became the first country on the planet to decriminalize all drug usage.

The country provides universal education and health care to its citizens. Sweden uses it location and coastline to boost its economy for which import/export businesses are the foundation.

Mining and metallurgy are the main components of its economy. Although the country is landlocked, transportation has often been achieved by using the Danube River.
